location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Major George Willock, Secretary in Charge of the British Mission, Tabrize [Tabrīz]

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, informs Major George Willock that he has dispatched two boxes of stationery for the British Mission at Tabrize [Tabrīz]. In addition, Stannus states that another box, addressed to Major Monteith, has been dispatched to the Agent at Shiraz, who will forward it.
